Package hrps.control

Class RoomController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.control.RoomController
  • public class RoomController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents controller for rooms, includes creating new rooms or initializing rooms from database, searching, updating and checking-in guests to rooms. Each room is assign a unique room number.
    Author:
    Peng Wenxuan, An Ruyi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static ReservationController reservationController
      Room controller works closely with Reservation controller.
      private static java.lang.String ROOM_DATA_PATH
      The text file that contains hotel's rooms' structure.
      private static java.lang.String ROOM_LIST_DATA_DIR
      Rooms data file's path.
      private static java.lang.String ROOM_STATUS_DATA_DIR
      Rooms status data file's path.
      private static RoomController RoomController
      The static controller instance to avoid multiple instantiations.
      private java.util.List<Room> roomList
      List of all room objects of the system.
      private java.util.ArrayList<RoomStatus> roomStatusList
      ArrayList contains statuses of all rooms, with same indexes as indexes of rooms in roomList.
      private static int TOTAL_ROOMS
      Total number of rooms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private RoomController()
      Initialize RoomController by reading from rooms status data file, if the data file does not exist at the path, create it and write the on-memory rooms' status data to the newly created file.

      • getInstance

        public static RoomController getInstance()
        Get the RoomController instance. This is to avoid multiple instantiation of controller.
        Returns:
        The singleton RoomController instance.

      • newRoom

        public Room newRoom​(java.lang.String roomNumber,
                    java.lang.String roomType,
                    java.lang.String roomBedType,
                    java.lang.String roomFacing,
                    RoomStatus roomStatus,
                    java.lang.String hasWifi,
                    java.lang.String isSmokingFree,
                    java.lang.String rate)
        Create a new room based on the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - Room's number.
        roomType - Room's type.
        roomBedType - Room's bed type.
        roomFacing - Room's facing direction.
        roomStatus - Room's status
        hasWifi - Whether room has Wi-fi or not.
        isSmokingFree - Whether room is smoking free or not.
        rate - Room's rate.
        Returns:
        The just-created room.

      • initializeRooms

        public java.util.List<Room> initializeRooms()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize rooms from the information read from the text file, RoomData.txt, and add them to the rooms list.
        Returns:
        A List of rooms.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If encounters error while reading from database.

        Find the room with the specified room number.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The specified room number.
        Returns:
        Return the room with the specified room number if it exists in the rooms' container, null otherwise.

        Check if the room with the specified room number can be ordered room service.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The specified room number.
        Returns:

        guest - The specified guest.
        Returns:

      • maintain

        public Room maintain​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
        Maintain a room by setting its status to MAINTENANCE, ONLY IF its current status is VACANT.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - Number of the room to be accessed for maintenance.
        Returns:
        The Room with the above room number, after being accessed for maintenance.

      • finishMaintain

        public Room finishMaintain​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
        Finish maintaining a room and set its status to VACANT.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The room number of the room to finish maintaining.
        Returns:
        The room with the above room number, after finish maintaining.

      • isMaintaining

        public boolean isMaintaining​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
        Check if a room is being maintained.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The room number to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the room status is able to accessed and the status is MAINTENANCE, false otherwise.

      • checkAvailableRooms

        public java.util.List<Room> checkAvailableRooms​(java.util.List<Room> rooms)
        Find all rooms that are VACANT from a List of rooms.
        Parameters:
        rooms - List of rooms to be searched.
        Returns:
        A List of all rooms from the specified list that are VACANT.

      • checkAvailableRooms

        public java.util.List<Room> checkAvailableRooms​(java.util.List<Room> rooms,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime expectedCheckInDate,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime expectedCheckOutDate)
                                         throws InvalidDatePairException
        Finds all rooms that are available for a period of stay between a check-in date and a check-out date, from a given List of rooms. VACANT rooms are automatically qualified as they do not have any booking, for each RESERVED or OCCUPIED room, this method checks if the above staying period could fit in the VACANT period of the room.
        Parameters:
        rooms - List of rooms to be searched.
        expectedCheckInDate - The expected check in date.
        expectedCheckOutDate - The expected check out date.
        Returns:
        A List of all rooms from the specified list that are VACANT for the above period check-in - check-out date.
        Throws:
        InvalidDatePairException - If the specified check in date is after the specified check out date.

      • checkOutRoom

        public boolean checkOutRoom​(Room room,
                            java.time.LocalDateTime actualCheckOutDate)
        Changes the status of the room. When a room is checking out, if there is future reservation or waitlist reservation become available to reserve, set it to reserved. Else, vacant.
        Parameters:
        room - The room to be checked out.
        actualCheckOutDate - the actual check out date of the room.
        Returns:
        true if the room is set to vacant, false otherwise.

                                             java.lang.String facing)
        Find rooms with the specified facing direction from a list of rooms.
        Parameters:
        rooms - List of rooms to be searched.
        facing - The specified facing direction.
        Returns:
        A List of all rooms from the specified list that have the specified facing direction.

      • isValidRoomNumber

        public boolean isValidRoomNumber​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
                          throws HRPSException
        Check if the specified String is the number of a room that actually exists in system.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The specified String.
        Returns:
        true if the specified String actually represents an existed room.
        Throws:
        InvalidRoomNumberFormatException - if the specified String is not a legal room number.
        RoomNumberNotExistException - if the specified String is not an existed room number.
        HRPSException
